plot: Growing up in Iran where bombs frequently fell from the sky, a free-spirited girl leaves behind her father and moves to America to find freedom. Only to realize the oppression has followed her all the way to LA.
title: To the Moon
plot_es: Growing up in Iran where bombs frequently fell from the sky, a free-spirited girl leaves behind her father and moves to America to find freedom. Only to realize the oppression has followed her all the way to LA.
plot_en: Growing up in Iran where bombs frequently fell from the sky, a free-spirited girl leaves behind her father and moves to America to find freedom. Only to realize the oppression has followed her all the way to LA.
